attributes.comment:
Please do not raise the current fees for adoptive parents for the adoption
applications. Adoptive parents already have to come up with much money to adopt
internationally and raising the fees will cause even more undue financial burdens
and hardship for those who wish to bring orphans overseas into the U. S. and
adoptive homes.

Adoptive parents should have support and be encouraged to adopt these waiting
children and raising the fees will not help the children overseas to find loving, good
homes as the expenses are astronomincally high enough already. Adoption
should be rewarded and those who adopt deserve a break to bring a child into their
home to raise as their own, Adoption is a very admirable and noteworty act. Acts
such as these should be supported, not made more difficult for the person who
desires to build their families through adopting. Thank you, Mary
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent, Mary
